Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-25219 affecting package asio for versions less than 1.31.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-25219 affecting package asio for versions less than 1.31.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package asio is earlier than 1.31.0-1, affected by CVE-2019-25219
